summary: This document is a chain of FBI emails from February 2021 discussing the coordination of an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails involve FBI agents from the New York and Denver field offices arranging logistics and referencing prior assistance provided to the victim.

persons.name: M. Crowley
persons.context: FBI agent in the Denver field office who is copied on an email discussing coordination with a victim; noted as having previously met the victim.

events.title: Scheduled FBI interview with Epstein victim
events.description: FBI agents coordinate and schedule an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein for the following morning at 10:30 AM.

events.title: Prior FBI assistance to Epstein victim
events.description: Reference to FBI agents having assisted the same victim the previous year, including providing information about trauma-focused therapy.

keyFacts: FBI agents were actively coordinating an interview with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein in February 2021.
The victim had previously been assisted by the FBI in 2020 and was seeking a trauma-focused therapist.
The email chain shows inter-office coordination between the New York and Denver FBI field offices.
Agent M. Crowley from the Denver office had previously met the victim and was involved in the coordination.
